courses.advice_detail_en: A bit chilly but good for running. Light layering works well. Almost no wind, good for maintaining your pace. The surface is wet, and some sections may be slippery. Slightly lower your pace and take extra care on downhills and corners. Air quality is good with little impact on running. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
